Free Action.

name: Snow Mark
description:
Heals target ally for 2 x 7.
Shields target ally for 2 x 5.
Applies Redirect to target ally.

name: Snow Support
description:
Heals all allies for 2 x 6.
Cleanses 2 debuffs from all allies.
Applies 2 Sidekick to self.

name: Solar Ray
description:
4 x 6 Fire/Wind damage against target enemy.
Applies 4 Burn & 3 Weakness to target enemy.

name: Stoke the Fire
description:
3 x 3 Fire damage against target enemy.
Generates Fire Aether for each Burn stack on the target. (Up to 5.)

name: Stolen Gemstone
description:
Steals 2 enemy Aether.
Applies 2 Sidekick to self.

name: Summon Faun
description:
Summons Minion: Faun with 5 Essence on target ally.
Faun: Health +5
Action: Heals self for 3 x 2.
Then deals Earth/Water damage to target enemy equal to 10% of the attached monster's current health, rounded up.

name: Summon Impundulu
description:
Summons Minion: Impundulu with 5 Essence on target ally.
Impundulu: Sidekick Damage +1.
Action: 2 x 3 Wind/Fire damage against target enemy.
On Interrupt: Applies 1 Essence to self.

name: Summon Kami
description:
Summons Minion: Kami with 5 Essence on target ally.
Kami: Aether +1
Action: 1 x 1 Wild damage against target enemy.
Deals additional damage for each Aether of any element.

name: Summon Salamander
description:
Summons Minion: Salamander with 5 Essence on target ally.
Salamander: Burn Damage +1.
Action: 1 x 5 Earth/Fire damage against target enemy.
Triggers Burn on target enemy.

name: Summon Wisp
description:
Summons Minion: Wisp with 5 Essence on target ally.
Wisp: Shield Generator +2.
Action: 1 x 5 Fire/Water damage against target enemy.
+1 damage for every stack of Age.

name: Summon Yokai
description:
Summons Minion: Yokai with 5 Essence on target ally.
Yokai: Evasion +15%.
Action: 1 x 5 Earth/Wind damage against target enemy.
Applies 2 Weakness to target enemy.

name: Torment Nexus
description:
Transfers the Terror stacks of all allies and enemies onto target enemy.
Transferring triggers Cleansing effects.

name: Toxic Sprawl
description:
2 x 5 Water/Earth damage against target enemy.
Applies X Poison to target enemy. (1 for each Regeneration stack consumed by allies in this combat)

name: Unstable Charm
description:
Applies 2 Force to target ally.
1 x 4 Water/Fire damage against target ally.
Free Action.

name: Vampiric Bite
description:
1 x 3 Water damage against target enemy.
If this action kills an enemy: Heals self for 10 and increases this action's damage by 2. For the rest of the run.

name: Viral Bloom Guard
description:
Shields self for 2 x 7.
Applies Redirect to self.
Retaliate: Triggers Poison on all enemies.

name: Viral Burst
description:
3 x 3 Water/Earth damage against target enemy.
On Crit: Applies 2 Poison to target enemy.
Triggers Poison on target enemy.

name: Void Lightning
description:
5 x 3 Fire/Wind damage against target enemy.
Consumes 1 Wild Aether: Applies Power to self.

name: Volcanic Unity
description:
Heals all allies for 3 x 7.
Allies gain: "Retaliate: {heals} self for 8 and generates random Aether."

name: Water Ritual
description:
Applies 2 Age to target ally.
Generates Water/Water/Water Aether.

name: Water Tone
description:
Consumes 1 Regeneration on target ally as additional cost.
Applies 2 Weakness to all enemies.
Free Action.

name: Wild Mark
description:
Applies Redirect to target ally.
Retaliate: Triggers a 2 x 4 Wild damage attack against the enemy and applies 3 Terror to them.

name: Wildflower Harvest
description:
3 x 5 Water/Earth damage against target enemy.
Purges 2 enemy Aether.
On Interrupt: Generates Wild Aether.

name: Wildflower Shield
description:
Shields all allies for 2 x 4.
Generates Wild Aether for every 8 debuff stacks among all monsters in combat.

name: Wind Ritual
description:
Applies 2 Sidekick to target ally.
Generates Wind/Wind/Wind Aether.

name: Basic Attack
description:
2 x 2 damage against target enemy.
Generates [x] Aether.

name: Basic Heal
description:
Heals target ally for 2 x 3
Generates [x] Aether.

name: Bountiful Wish
description: Generates Water/Fire/Wind/Earth.

name: Fierce Wish
description: Applies 2 Force to all allies.

name: Protective Wish
description: Applies 3 Dodge to target ally.
